A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars was a decent movie. I would say good not great. At times they tried to hard to be funny\, and the storyline felt rushed. I would've liked to see more of Rey's journey to find the force instead of just her getting it on the first try. I didn't understand Rose as a character and found her to be pointless to the plot. It was a fun movie\, but it didn't strike me as a Star Wars movie.
